predicate.note: Frames file for 'attest' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to affirm to be correct, indicate

example.name: transitive
example.text: I can attest that a recent Colombian visitor to the U.S. was offered [*-1] drugs three times in the few blocks ' walk between Grand Central Terminal and the Waldorf Astoria Hotel in midtown Manhattan .
example.arg: a recent Colombian visitor to the U.S. was offered [*-1] drugs three times in the few blocks ' walk between Grand Central Terminal and the Waldorf Astoria Hotel in midtown Manhattan
